entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0130.9725] The calculated earnings or loss per share does not equal the actual value reported for the concept BasicEarningsLossPerShare for the period 2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31. The value reported is 2.37. The calculated value is calculated by dividing the concept ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity with a value of 4,940,000,000 by the denominator WeightedAverageShares with a value of 2,084,900,000. This equals 2.3694 (rounded 4d) which differs from the reported value of 2.37. Please check that the calculation is correct or that the correct elements have been used.
Element : BasicEarningsLossPerShare Period : 2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31 Dimensions : dei:LegalEntityAxis=db:consolidatedBankEntityMember Decimals : 4 Unit : EUR/shares
Rule Element Id:9725 Rule version: 26.0.9 - deutschebankag-20241231.htm 154822

[DQC.IFRS.0130.9725] The calculated earnings or loss per share does not equal the actual value reported for the concept DilutedEarningsLossPerShare for the period 2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31. The value reported is 2.32. The calculated value is calculated by dividing the concept ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects with a value of 4,940,000,000 by the denominator AdjustedWeightedAverageShares with a value of 2,125,600,000. This equals 2.324 (rounded 4d) which differs from the reported value of 2.32. Please check that the calculation is correct or that the correct elements have been used.
Element : DilutedEarningsLossPerShare Period : 2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31 Dimensions : dei:LegalEntityAxis=db:consolidatedBankEntityMember Decimals : 4 Unit : EUR/shares
Rule Element Id:9725 Rule version: 26.0.9 - deutschebankag-20241231.htm 154845

[DQC.IFRS.0130.9725] The calculated earnings or loss per share does not equal the actual value reported for the concept BasicEarningsLossPerShare for the period 2023-01-01 to 2023-12-31. The value reported is 2.83. The calculated value is calculated by dividing the concept ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity with a value of 5,834,000,000 by the denominator WeightedAverageShares with a value of 2,064,100,000. This equals 2.8264 (rounded 4d) which differs from the reported value of 2.83. Please check that the calculation is correct or that the correct elements have been used.
Element : BasicEarningsLossPerShare Period : 2023-01-01 to 2023-12-31 Dimensions : dei:LegalEntityAxis=db:consolidatedBankEntityMember Decimals : 4 Unit : EUR/shares

[DQC.IFRS.0130.9725] The calculated earnings or loss per share does not equal the actual value reported for the concept DilutedEarningsLossPerShare for the period 2023-01-01 to 2023-12-31. The value reported is 2.77. The calculated value is calculated by dividing the concept ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects with a value of 5,834,000,000 by the denominator AdjustedWeightedAverageShares with a value of 2,104,000,000. [DQC.IFRS.0130.9725] The calculated earnings or loss per share does not equal the actual value reported for the concept DilutedEarningsLossPerShare for the period 2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31. The value reported is 1.85. The calculated value is calculated by dividing the concept ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects with a value of 3,768,000,000 by the denominator AdjustedWeightedAverageShares with a value of 2,039,300,000. This equals 1.8477 (rounded 4d) which differs from the reported value of 1.85. Please check that the calculation is correct or that the correct elements have been used.
Element : DilutedEarningsLossPerShare Period : 2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31 Dimensions : dei:LegalEntityAxis=db:consolidatedBankEntityMember Decimals : 4 Unit : EUR/shares
